The '''Treasure Hoarder's Key''' is a quest item obtained from a chest in [[Lingju Pass]] during the quest [[And This Treasure Goes To...]]

It is used to unlock the cell [[Alrani]] was locked away in by the [[Treasure Hoarders]].
